de.fh_erfurt.cst.controller

Class ProblemController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fh_erfurt.cst.controller.ProblemController

  • public class ProblemController
extends java.lang.Object
    The ProblemController class is responsible for the logical tasks, e.g. creating new training tasks and triggering the display update of the mapped view. It is intended to be instantiated by ProblemActivity.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Problem currentProblem
      Stores an object with infos about the currently displayed training problem
      private java.util.LinkedList<Problem> problemQueue
      A queue to make it possible to repeat training problems
      private VarStore.ProblemType problemType
      An enum value for the different types of training problems like addition or subtraction
      private int RESCHEDULE_INDEX
      The amount of displayed problems before a rescheduled problem occurs again
      private StatisticModel statistic
      The class which handels the data for the statistic
      private ProblemActivity view
      The interface where the user sees his/her training tasks

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProblemController(ProblemActivity view, VarStore.ProblemType problemType)
      Creates an new instance of the class which controlles the logic of the training sessions.

      • ProblemController

        public ProblemController(ProblemActivity view,
                 VarStore.ProblemType problemType)
        Creates an new instance of the class which controlles the logic of the training sessions.
        Parameters:
        view - the view with the GUI for the training sessions
        problemType - the problem type the user is training

    • Method Detail

      • nextProblem

        public void nextProblem()
        Triggers the display of a new training problem in the UI

      • receiveAnswer

        public void receiveAnswer(java.lang.Double answer)
        Notify the logic class about the answer of the user. After evaluation the method triggers nextProblem() from a listener registered on an alert dialog.
        Parameters:
        answer - the number presentation of the user's input

      • getProblemType

        public VarStore.ProblemType getProblemType()
        Returns the current type of training problem
        Returns:
        an enum value for the problem type

      • getCurrentLevel

        public int getCurrentLevel()
        Returns the level on which the user is training
        Returns:
        an integer level code for the current level

      • setCurrentLevel

        public void setCurrentLevel(int level)
        Sets the level in the settings and the display
        Parameters:
        level - the desired training level

      • clearProblemQueue

        public void clearProblemQueue()
        Removes all previously scheduled training problemes

      • showAlertDialogAndContinue

        private void showAlertDialogAndContinue(java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String message)
        Shows an alert dialog with answer evaluation and triggers the creation of a new problem after closing the dialog.
        Parameters:
        title - statement whether answer was right or wrong
        message - solution of the problem

      • getFalseAnswerMessage

        private java.lang.String getFalseAnswerMessage(java.lang.Double answer)
        Convenience method to encapsulate the creation of the false answer method.
        Parameters:
        answer - the wrong answer of the user as number presentation
        Returns:
        the message to be displayed in the alert dialog

      • getRightAnswerMessage

        private java.lang.String getRightAnswerMessage()
        Convenience method to encapsulate the creation of the right answer method.
        Parameters:
        answer - the right answer of the user as number presentation
        Returns:
        the message to be displayed in the alert dialog

      • getLevelKey

        private java.lang.String getLevelKey()
        Get the key which is used in SharedPreferences to store the current level.
        Returns:
        the value of 'android:key' for the level preference according to the current problem type.

      • resheduleProblem

        private void resheduleProblem(int targetIndex,
                    Problem problem)
        Insert a problem into the problem queue at the specified position
        Parameters:
        problem - the arithmetic problem to be resheduled
        targetIndex - the index at which the resheduled problem shall reside in the problem queue list

      • getView

        protected ProblemActivity getView()
        Getter for the view which has created this class
        Returns:
        the UI where the user is training
